00017 #include <ulib/timeval.h>
00018 
00019 class U_EXPORT UEventTime : public UTimeVal {
00020 public:
00021 
00022         struct timeval ctime;
00023 
00024         void reset() { ctime.tv_sec = ctime.tv_usec = 0L; }
00025 
00026         UEventTime(long sec = 0L, long usec = 0L) : UTimeVal(sec, usec)
00027                 {
00028                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEventTime, "%ld,%ld", sec, usec)
00029 
00030                 reset();
00031                 }
00032 
00033         virtual ~UEventTime()
00034                 {
00035                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEventTime)
00036                 }
00037 
00038         bool operator<(const UEventTime& t) const;
00039 
00040         // SERVICES
00041 
00042         bool isOld() const;
00043         void setCurrentTime();
00044         void setTimerVal(struct timeval* it_value);
00045 
00046         time_t expire() { return (ctime.tv_sec + tv_sec); }
00047 
00048         // -------------------------------------------
00049         // method VIRTUAL to define
00050         // -------------------------------------------
00051         // return value: -1 -> normal, 0 -> monitoring
00052         // -------------------------------------------
00053 
00054         virtual int handlerTime() { return -1; }
00055 
00056         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UEventTime& t);
00057         
00058 #ifdef DEBUG
00059         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00060 #endif
00061 };
